reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Hab.A.M.A. - Autosufficienza alimentare e sviluppo di iniziative economiche sostenibili a L’Avana

description.narrative: L’iniziativa si prefigge di rafforzare le capacità delle istituzioni, dei produttori e degli attori locali con l’obiettivo di promuovere l’autosufficienza alimentare municipale, attraverso l’aumento della produzione locale e l'accesso a cibo sano e diversificato in cinque municipi della provincia di L’Avana. Tramite l’attuazione di una strategia economicamente sostenibile e resiliente, l’intervento prevede la creazione di partenariati commerciali e la commercializzazione di prodotti cubani di qualità nel mercato italiano ed europeo.

The initiative aims at strengthening institutions, smallholders and local actors’ capacities to promote food self-sufficiency through increased local production and access to healthy and diversified food products in five municipalities in the Havana province. Through the implementation of an economically sustainable and resilient strategy, the project foresees the creation of business partnerships and the marketing of quality Cuban products in the Italian and European markets.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
